title: Can we get the recent login themes on Spotify? (Specifically Kindred - the Eternal Hunters, Camille)
body:
I was wondering why these aren't added to spotify while arcade ahri's login theme for example does get added.

(can Ed the Conqueror maybe pull some strings to make this happen?)

replies.body: It's definitely not what you asked for but if you're looking for all music they do exist on the [LoL Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends)
Which you can download from there & then play on Spotify via "Local Files". Make a playlist of it & you're set.
Yeah, the biggest problem is it's just a hassle to do on all devices whenever new stuff comes out. I use it at home, work, mobile, at friends, etc.

Thanks! I'll download them and import them locally for now I guess.  
Would be really nice if all these songs are eventually uploaded to spotify too though :-)
